snippet: Quartets composed by Shostakovich in memory of lost players might also be viewed as tributes to the dynamics of an enduring ensemble.
abstract: Spooky effect created from odd tapping technique, which will be featured in pieces dedicated to deceased players, will be on display when Emerson String Quartet performs at Alice Tully Hall.
lead_paragraph: Quartets composed by Shostakovich in memory of lost players might also be viewed as tributes to the dynamics of an enduring ensemble.

headline.main: In Poignant Paeans, Lost Players Live On
headline.print_headline: In Poignant Paeans, Lost Players Live On
